description: Meet Jayce, a 26-year-old man who identifies as straight because he’s never had the pleasure of having a hard rod in his ass…yet! A virgin to the world of gay sex, the dark-haired, muscular hunk admits he has engaged in toy play, but it’s only happened a handful of times. “I found a dildo laying around in the house. It was my roommate’s and I just used it,” says Jayce. “My ass has never been played with and I want my ass to be played with, licked and all that good stuff.” He won't be an anal virgin for much longer!
title: Jayce
